backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining Event, Artist, and UserProfile types with CRUD operations, access-controlled endpoints for user profiles and radar events, and seed data initialization for techno artists and their events.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries of all frontend source files, describing their purpose and key implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including background, foreground, card, border, and chart color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the Techno Beacon app, loading the React app via /src/main.tsx and setting the favicon and viewport meta.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with routes for Discover, Artists, Artist Detail, and My Radar pages, wrapped in a Layout with Navigation, footer, ProfileSetupModal, and Toaster.
Admin-only button component that triggers backend seed data initialization, showing loading/success/error states with toast notifications and an admin badge.
frontend/src/components/ArtistCard.tsx: Artist card component displaying image, name, genre, and event count with a follow/unfollow toggle button and click-to-open event popup, navigating to the artist detail page on a separate button.
frontend/src/components/ArtistEventPopup: A popup component that displays events for a specific artist, allowing authenticated users to add/remove events from their radar and open a trip planner modal.
frontend/src/components/EventCard.tsx: A card component for displaying a single event with date, location, and source info, supporting radar toggle and trip planner functionality for authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/EventFilters.tsx: A filter bar component with inputs for artist name, city, and date range, displaying active filter badges and a clear button when filters are applied.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: A centered prompt component that displays a login button with a customizable title and message for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: A sticky top navigation bar with links to Discover, Artists, and My Radar pages, plus authentication controls for login/logout and user profile display.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that prompts newly authenticated users to enter their name to create a profile, blocking interaction until the form is submitted.
frontend/src/components/SourceBadge.tsx: A small badge component that displays the event data source (e.g., RA, Bandsintown) with color-coded styling per source.
frontend/src/components/TripPlannerModal: A modal dialog component that lets users plan travel to a concert event by entering their home city and budget level, then generates Skyscanner flight and Booking.com hotel links with appropriate dates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React Query hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor, reinitializing it when the user's identity changes and invalidating dependent queries accordingly.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider component using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including events, artists, user profiles, and tracked artists, using the actor from useActor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that defines a dark industrial techno theme using Tailwind CSS with custom OKLCH color tokens, neon amber/green accent utilities, and Space Grotesk/Space Mono fonts.
frontend/src/lib/eventIdLookup.ts: Provides a static lookup table mapping composite keys of artistId and dateTime nanoseconds to backend event IDs, with a helper function to retrieve an event's backend ID.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/ArtistDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single artist's profile (image, name, genre) and their upcoming events, with loading skeletons, error handling with retry, and defensive filtering of stale event data.
frontend/src/pages/ArtistsPage.tsx: Lists all artists with a search filter, per-artist event counts, and tracking state, including error/loading states and an admin init button when no data is present.
frontend/src/pages/DiscoverPage.tsx: Main event discovery page with a hero banner, artist/city/date filters, sanitised and sorted event cards, and an optional admin seed button when the canister has no data.
frontend/src/pages/MyRadarPage.tsx: Authenticated user's personal radar page showing saved/tracked artist events with ticket links to Dice and Songkick, guarded by a login prompt for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Simple 404 page with a pulsing radio icon and a link back to the home route.
frontend/src/utils/ticketSearch.ts: Utility that builds search URLs for ticket platforms (Dice and Songkick) given an artist name.
frontend/src/utils/travelLinks.ts: Provides city-to-IATA airport code mapping and helper functions to generate Skyscanner and Booking.com travel links from event city names.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme extensions including neon color palette, box shadows, fonts (Space Grotesk/Mono), OKLCH-based semantic colors, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Project state document for Techno Beacon app tracking version, architecture notes, known issues (artist data not loading, incorrect event dates), and existing/planned features across frontend and backend.
